short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a preview of markdown files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Drag and drop markdown files into the previewer window to display a preview! *Note: this is not a markdown editor, only a previewer.

This app is available in the "Apps" section of Chrome (type "chrome://apps" in the address bar if you can't find it).  This app is licensed under the MIT license:
